property.value:
A grouped numpad (with user settable maximum).
When SEND is pressed the value will be set as the groups tag, and can be used from there for other controls or MIDI and OSC messages of the users need.
Enjoy!

-- set this limit to change the numpads max range --
local limit = 127
----------------------------------------------------
-- set the size to wich the hide function should shrink the numpad -- "small" is default and will shrink it to a small button -- "big" will make it shrink to the size of the numvalue field
local hideButtonSize = "small"
----------------------------------------------------
-- numpad for TouchOSC by Felix E 2021 -- https://github.com/F-l-i-x/TouchOSC/tree/main/modules/numpad
local startup = 0
function init() startup = 1 end
function update() if startup == 1 then self.children.numvalue:notify("LIMIT", limit) self.children.numhide:notify(hideButtonSize) startup = 0 end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("7") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("8") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("9") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("4") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("5") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("6") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("1") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("2") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("3") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("0") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("CLR") end end
function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("DEL") end end

function onValueChanged(key) if (key == "x" and self.values.x == 1) then -- only on rise of x self.parent.properties.tag = self.parent.children.numvalue.values.text self.parent.values.touch = 1 -- we need to change the touch to trigger local messages self.parent.values.touch = 0 self.parent.children.numvalue:notify("SEND") end end

-- numpad for TouchOSC by Felix E 2021 -- https://github.com/F-l-i-x/TouchOSC/tree/main/modules/numpad
local limit = 127 local tempstring = "0" local is_sent = 0 local limitlen = tonumber(string.len(tostring(limit))) local do_once = 0
function onReceiveNotify(msg, value)
if msg == "LIMIT" then limit = value return end
if msg == "SEND" then is_sent = 1 return end
if msg == "CLR" then tempstring = "0" elseif (msg == "DEL" and tempstring == "0") or (msg == "DEL" and string.len(tempstring) < 2) then tempstring = "0" elseif msg == "DEL" and string.len(tempstring) > 1 then tempstring = tempstring:sub(1, -2) elseif msg == "0" and tempstring == "0" then tempstring = "0" elseif (msg ~= "0" and tempstring == "0") or (msg ~= "0" and is_sent == 1) or (msg == "0" and is_sent == 1) then tempstring = msg else tempstring = tempstring .. msg end
if (string.len(tempstring) > limitlen) or (tonumber(tempstring) > limit) then tempstring = tempstring:sub(1, -2) end
if tonumber(tempstring) <= limit then self.values.text = tempstring end
is_sent = 0 end

local hideState = self.tag local hideSize = 0
function onValueChanged(key) if key == "x" and self.values.x == 1 then if hideState == 1 then if hideSize == 0 then self.parent.properties.frame.w = 66 self.parent.properties.frame.h = 48 self.parent.children.hidebuttonsmall.properties.visible = 0 self.parent.children.hidelabelsmall.properties.visible = 0 else self.parent.properties.frame.w = 20 self.parent.properties.frame.h = 20 self.parent.children.hidebuttonsmall.properties.visible = 1 self.parent.children.hidelabelsmall.properties.visible = 1 end hideState = 0 else self.parent.properties.frame.w = 127 self.parent.properties.frame.h = 208 self.parent.children.hidebuttonsmall.properties.visible = 0 self.parent.children.hidelabelsmall.properties.visible = 0 hideState = 1 end end self.tag = hideState end
function onReceiveNotify(key) if key == "big" then hideSize = 0 else hideSize = 1 end end
